mapper.select: SELECT v.id,v.create_time,v.update_time,v.is_delete isDeleted,v.vin, v.ex_factory_date leaveFactory,v.tsp_vehicle_std_model_id,e.sn,e.imei,e.sim,l.plate_code FROM tsp_vehicle v LEFT JOIN tsp_equipment e ON v.tsp_equipment_id = e.id LEFT JOIN tsp_vehicle_license l ON v.id = l.tsp_vehicle_id
